description_: Classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
Delicious French dessert consisting of rich custard topped with caramelized sugar.
Authentic Mexican street food made with marinated pork cooked on a vertical rotisserie.
Popular Japanese dish made with vinegared rice, seafood, and vegetables rolled in seaweed.
Classic American dessert with a rich and creamy cheesecake filling on a graham cracker crust.
Traditional Thai stir-fried noodle dish with shrimp, tofu, eggs, and peanuts in a tangy sauce.
Famous Spanish rice dish cooked with saffron, seafood, chicken, and vegetables.
Popular Indian curry dish with tender chicken pieces cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce.
Classic Greek dish made with layers of eggplant, potatoes, ground meat, and béchamel sauce.
Chinese dumplings filled with ground pork, cabbage, and spices, served with dipping sauce.
A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
A popular Indian dish consisting of marinated and grilled chicken pieces served in a spiced tomato-based curry sauce.
A rich and creamy French dessert made with a smooth custard base topped with a layer of caramelized sugar.
Traditional Mexican dish made with corn tortillas filled with seasoned chicken, cheese, and topped with enchilada sauce.
A classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cheese, and cocoa powder.
A popular Thai street food dish made with stir-fried rice noodles, eggs, tofu, shrimp, and a tangy sauce.
Fresh and flavorful Mexican dip made with mashed avocado, lime juice, tomatoes, onions, and cilantro.
A delicate French dessert made with beaten egg whites and various flavorings, baked until puffed and golden.
Rolled sushi made with vinegared rice, fish, and vegetables, often served with soy sauce and wasabi.
A classic Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, and a drizzle of olive oil.
Authentic Mexican street food made with corn or flour tortillas filled with various fillings such as seasoned meat, beans, and salsa.
A North Indian dish made with spinach (palak) and paneer (Indian cottage cheese) cooked in a spiced creamy sauce.
A spicy and sour Thai soup made with shrimp, lemongrass, kaffir lime leaves, galangal, and chili peppers.
A classic French savory tart made with a custard filling of eggs, cream, cheese, and bacon, baked in a pastry crust.
Traditional Mexican dish consisting of roasted poblano peppers stuffed with cheese, then battered and fried.
Pasta dish made with fettuccine noodles, chicken, and a rich Alfredo sauce made from butter, cream, and Parmesan cheese.
Light and crispy Japanese dish consisting of battered and deep-fried seafood and vegetables.
Classic Italian appetizer made with toasted bread topped with diced tomatoes, garlic, basil, and olive oil.
Creamy Indian curry made with tender chicken pieces cooked in a spinach-based sauce flavored with spices.
A popular Thai stir-fried noodle dish made with wide rice noodles, Chinese broccoli, eggs, and a savory sauce.
